item.title: Projects
item.description: csv2md Command line tool for converting CSV files into Markdown tables. plyushkin Command line application for dumping photos from your VK account. barman Tiny terminal histogram creator. HackerRank Interview Preparation Kit Solutions Solutions to the HackerRank Interview Preparation Kit in Python.

item.title: Library
item.description: Presentations Scala Implicits, Lev Zakharov (2019) Reading Software Engineering The Pragmatic Programmer, David Thomas and Andrew Hunt The Little Book of Semaphores, Allen B. Downey Microservices Patterns, Chris Richardson Test-Driven Web Development with Python, Harry J.W. Percival Designing Data-Intensive Applications, Martin Kleppmann UML 2 and the unified process, Jim Arlow and Ila Neustadt Computer Science Distilled: Learn the Art of Solving Computational Problems, Wladston Ferreira Filho The Little MongoDB Book, Karl Seguin Managing the development of large software systems, Dr.

item.title: Резюме
item.description: Захаров Лев, Golang Developer Контакты Email: l.j.zakharov@gmail.com Telegram: @lzakharov GitHub: lzakharov Образование Казанский Федеральный Университет, Высшая школа информационных технологий и информационных систем, 2014 - 2018, Прикладная информатика (красный диплом). Навыки Языки программирования: Golang, Python, Scala. Базы данных: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, MinIO. Брокеры сообщений: Kafka, NATS.
